directions.step:
1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. In a food processor or blender, whirl the cottage cheese, milk, sugar, egg, egg white and vanilla for about 1 minute or until smooth. Transfer the mixture to a shallow dish, place the bread in it, and let stand for 10 minutes. Turn the bread over and let stand another 10 minutes. Meanwhile, grease a baking dish and place it in a preheated oven for 7 minutes.
2.Remove the baking sheet from the oven, place the bread on it and bake for 6 minutes. Turn the bread over and bake 5-6 minutes more or until golden brown. Makes 4 servings Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #831 by slhire@juno.com (Sandra L Hire) on Oct 8, 1997
